# Origin {#origin}
Nasal bone, Lateral nasal cartilage (upper part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion {#insertion}
Skin of lower forehead between eyebrows @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation {#innervation}

[Facial Nerve CN VII]({{< var ref-cn7.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action {#action}
Pulls medial angle of eyebrows inferiorly, producing transverse wrinkles over bridge of nose @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
